response.overview: At a village that a thief has stolen for a long time .Then the government must send “ Amnart “ who is a officer to lookafter here . He meet Duan , a daughter’s village headman while he falls in love Tanee , who is a mystery lady. Until Pair, his fiancee visits him to make Duan unpleased. Therefore , she asks Moon , a rowdy in the village to arrest Pair to rapes her but Tanee safe from rowdy.This event makes everybody fear Tanee as well as Amnart too. Because in actually she’s soul that he can’t alive with her in the realtime. He gives a shrine to her which he would like to confess Tanee.
response.title: TA – NEE
